title: HYDE PARK 1 BEDROOM WALK TO THE LAKE
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Gorgeous Remodeled Units in a Pristine Courtyard Building!
Located in the heart of Hyde Park, walking distance to The Museum of Science and Industry, Jackson Park, and The University of Chicago.
New Kitchens and Baths, Laundry on Premises, Hardwood Floors, Ceiling Fans – Must See!
Wifi for an additional for a $15 monthly fee, Pet Fee $25 per month, Building Protection Fee $12 per month.
Heat Included in Rent, Tenant Responsible for Electric and Cooking Gas.
For more information or to make an appointment to view this apartment call
(Photos are Examples of Apartments in the Building and May Not Represent the Currently Available Units)
